title: Banishment
content:
Banishment Level 4 Abjuration Spell Temporarily Banish your target to another plane of existence. 2 turns. 18m CHA Save Concentration Action Level 4 Spell Slot

Level 4 Abjuration Spell

Temporarily Banish your target to another plane of existence.

18m CHA Save Concentration

Banishment is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Banishment is a Lvl 4 Spell from the Abjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Banishment Information

Description: Temporarily Banish your target to another plane of existence. Level: Lvl 4 spell School: Abjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: CHA Save

How to Acquire Banishment

Banishment can be acquired by the following classes: Cleric, Paladin, Oath of the Crown, Oath of Vengeance, Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard Banishment can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Cleric, Paladin, Oath of the Crown, Oath of Vengeance, Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard
